values: just making sure my account still exists

Nobody fucking uses live journal anymore. 

I'm bored. 

Been sick. 

Had a nice/weird dream today. 

Kinda makes me want to go to sleep right now to see if I can dream it again. 

Ha!

This class is soooooo tiresome. If I could just watch the videos and then take a test about each instead of having to write paper on top of paper on top of paper I wouldn't be behind. I would probably have worked ahead if I could have done it that way, because the vidoes and audios are all very interesting. I just hate watching them when I know I'm going to have to write some horrible paper on them. It sucks. God I hope I pass this class. I really don't want to have to take this class again. Ugh. 


Amusement Park tomorrow. . . . . Fun Fun. Gonna ride the kiddie coasters with my neices. I think Megan's my favorite. I wish her mom wasn't so over protective, so I could actually hang out with her and do cool stuff. Someday I'll help her guage her ears out, and we'll go to rock concerts, me and Megan and Kayla, and it will be cool.

My brother just interrupted my homework, drunk . . . fucking TRASHED, crying and spitting all over me talking about how he doesn't even know me, and more incoherent shit that I couldn't make any sense of. I was so uncomfortable. I found out that he's dating some girl that's younger than me. That feels really good to know. I kept trying to get away from him and get back to my work, because the whole situation was just soooo akward and uncomfortable. Every time I took a step away he would say something wierd and want to hug me again. Ugh. When I finally did get back down here to the computer he came in to tell me that he wants to get on the internet when I'm done, but instead he told me that if he goes to Iraq and dies that I'll need to cancel all of his internet stuff. Then he wanted a lighter so he could go to the lake and set off bottle rockets, fell UP the stairs, rolled across the living room floor spilling Hot Damn as he went, and babbled on about if he's not back in fifteen minutes to call the ATF or something, I don't know. Soooo wierd, and akward, and uncomfortable. I think I'm going to try to go to bed before he gets back so I won't have to talk to him again tonight. . I really hope he doesn't remember any of this tomorrow.

Kayla had her first field day at school yesterday. I made sure to go up there and take lots of pictures. Her class field trip to the Zoo is today, and I can't go. I'm still too sore from my surgery to do that much walking in the hot sun. Even going up there for field day took a lot out of me. Sucks. I gave her a camera so she can take lots of pictures. Anyway, here's the track and field pics. 


Making a face and showing off her blue dot, for Blue Team.


The Relay race





She didn't understand the rules, so she didn't pass off the ribbon when she reached the next team (below). She tried to run the entire race instead.



The ball-between-your-legs race









At this point she didn't want to keep going, her teacher is giving her a pep-talk.


She kept dropping the ball.
She ended up finishing last. All the other kids finished and then all the teachers were on the side-lines cheering for Kayla for like another two minutes until she finished. It was cute, but also kind of embarrassing. Everyone feels like since she was disabled she needs extra encouragment, and it's almost sickening how thick they lay it on. She's made a LOT of progress this year. Why can't she just be treated like a regular kid? That's how I see her. 



Tug of war - Blue vs Yellow





(Yellow team won.)



Kayla and Kendra fighting over the water baloon, for the water baloon toss game.







Kayla with her ribbon.



Kayla and Kendra being goofy.




Kayla and her boyfriend, Shaun.



She said that she and Shaun got married in line one day, so he's her husband now. He licked her on the bus, that's how they started going out. It's sad that they won't be in the same class next year. I hate to split them up. But she'll always remember her first boyfriend. When I was in preschool my boyfriend's name was Andy. We used to lick our hands and hold hands on the bus. We thought that was making out.

I had to have my appendix taken out. They pulled it out through my belly button. I went in for a diagnostic laproscopy, and once they got in there they found out my appendix was bad and had to go. So they pulled it out through my belly button. I am in so much fucking pain right now. But I got to see the pictures they took inside my body, and that was awesome. I asked for copies to show everybody, and the doctor said he would make me some, but I guess he forgot. I'll keep bugging him. my appendix looked real bad. All swollen and red. And there was this huge blood vessel on it that looked like a big piece of red rope. That's what was causing all that pain in my abdomen. Now hopefully when I stop hurting I'll really stop hurting.

David is the best boyfriend I've ever had in my entire life. He was so amazing and so sweet to me today. He made me feel so loved, and I am so in love with him. And when my mother went off on me, screaming at me, berating and belittling me until I started crying, David was there to pick up the pieces and comfort me and take care of me. He is so good to me. I am so fucking greatful that he is so wonderful to me and treats me so sweetly. He's the only person in the world I actually think really gives a damn about me. He's my everything. He means everything to me.

I'm so proud of my little girl. 


She has a boyfriend at school. His name is Shaun. He's pretty cute for a four year old. She's got good taste.
The one on the orange paper is kind of hard to make out, but it's a turtle. And the one on the white paper is a worm.
HAPPY BIRTHDAY DAVID!!!!! I LOOOOVVVEEE YOUU SOOOOOO MUCH!!!!!!

WE'RE GETTING MARRIED!!!


We've been flirting with the idea for a while now, but we've decided to kind of make it official and announce our engagement. He's shopping for a ring and everything. There's no date set yet, but we're thinking roughly a year from now. So . . . . yep. We're getting married!

So, the Olive Garden guy (the voice on all of the Olive Garden commercials) : do you think his voice actually sounds like that? Or do you think there must be some sort of special douche filter over his microphone to make him sound that way? Or a douche effect in the recording equipment . . . ?

Ok, I liked Cali at first, but now I really want George to get together with Izzie. She's had such a tough time with Denny dying, and now her daughter. And she loves George. They should be together. And if Derek dumps Merideth again I'm going to be really upset, and I think I might even stop loving him. He needs to stop jerking her around. Oh, and I think Hanna's parents are going to be assholes. As soon as they get what they want from Izzie they're going to say that she can't see her kid and just disappear. Poor Izzie. I took the personality test, and I'm an Izzie. I think that's why I feel for her like I do. 





Aaaaaaaannnnd I love my boyfriend more than air.  

I think . . . . . I know . . . . . something's coming. And I am sooooo happy.
I really love my boyfriend. And I miss him. And I wish I had my car back so that I could go out to his house and actually BE with him, instead of sitting around here wistfully thinking of him.

I'm psyched. 


My mom's gonna get my car fixed for me. Her husband knows a guy who knows a guy who will do it for like $350. 

I really hope I don't have to pay her back for that. I still owe her so much money already. 

Plus I still have some old debts from last year when I was fucking everything up.

And I'm supposed to be saving money for this trip, and for a new car. 

I don't know how I'm going to do it all.

I'm going to seriously be working like 80 hour weeks this summer, no days off. It's going to suck. But Interpol and Modest Mouse? Fuck yeah. That's worth it. 


Beka B. and her little boy toy are coming with us. I think that's awesome. I wish I could have gone to concerts with my big brother when I was a teenager. I mean, if he listened to some better music. 

Kayla wants to go really bad. I keep telling her when she's older she can go to all the rock concerts she wants. Rock your heart out. 

I am so glad she's growing up with awesome music and a love for the rock and roll. If she turns out to be some kind of little ghetto ass gang banging rap listenin' to poser I will be so disappointed in myself, and always wonder what I did wrong. I'm doing everything I can to make sure she turns out to be an indie kid. Or at least not ghetto. That would suck.

So, the tickets are bought (though not yet paid for) Hotel reservation is made. Staying in a total dive, but it's the only one I could find that still had rooms available under $200 a night. I can't believe that this early the hotels are already booked solid. It's APRIL. The fucking thing isn't even for another four months. Anyway, babysitter is got, tickets, hotel . . . All I need to do now is find people to cover for me once I start working and will need days off for to go to the shooowz. Oh yeah, and WORK MY ASS OFF so I can pay for all this. I'm going to need to save like crazy. Plus, my car is seriously about to die, and I can't afford to fix it. I need to just but a new car. I'm supposed to be saving up for that. Way to prove to my mother that I'm responsible and taking my life seriously. I'm going to end up living with her forever. A perpetual dependant. FUCK!!! That reminds me I still need to do my taxes. I'm so fucked.

I got lotsa goodies for my birthday. 

4 new shirts 
2 new sweaters 
1 new pair of jeans 
1 new pair of shoes 
really nice make-up bag 
make-up 
really nice photo album 
digital camera  
new game for the computer 
2 awesome cakes 
bannana bread 
$10 from my grandma 


. . . and a partrige in a pear tree . . .  


AND my boyfriend took me blacklight bowling, and gave me really really good lovin's and treated me like a princess all night.  

I am a very spoiled, very happy, very lucky, and very greatful girl.  

The End.

Tomorrow Is My Birthday!
Tomorrow Is My Birthday!!
Tomorrow Is My Birthday!!!

I Am So Excited!!!!





Yip-diddy-birthday, confetti-etti-etti.

I want my own house. My own house to live in all by myself. No fat guys sitting on my couch, no shreiking mothers, no irritating kids, no brother playing the most offensive noise next to my room while I'm trying to sleep. My own house to live in all by myself, that I could furnish and decorate any way I want, full of all MY OWN STUFF, nobody else's shit cluttering it up. I wouldn't have to clean up after anybody else but myself. Wouldn't have to do anybody else's laundry, or wash anybody else's dusgusting crusty dishes. Just me. In my house. With my stuff. Doing what I want. By myself. Alone. Enjoying some peace and fucking quite for once.

I Need A Baby - Sitter!!!


HELP!

So, Monday was President's Day, and Kayla told me that in school on Tuesday she learned about a man named Al Blincoln. She said he was tall and he had a beard and he kept his papers in his hat because he didn't have a backpack. It is so cute to hear the things she says. To hear a three year old's interpretation of the lessons she's taught in school.

I am WAY too hormonal. 

I got choked up today over a dog food commercial. 

A dog food commercial.

The one with all the doggies in the pound: "I don't know how I ended up here. But I know that I am a good dog."






What is WRONG with me?!?



The just looked so sad.

Looks like Kayla's first day of school might be a snow day. What a drag. She doesn't think so. She said "Woo! I don't have to go to school at all ever again!" Sorry kid, but that's not what a snow day means. I was soooo looking forward to those four hours in the afternoon to spen all by myself. God, I miss being alone. I really really miss having time alone. "Alone time." It seems there has never been a more appealing concept.

Kayla starts school on Monday!!!!!

                          Hooray for Kayla!!!!!












P.S.
I love my forever boyfriend, forever. 

My mom is taking Kayla on vacation the week after next, and I actually get to spend Valentine's day with that beautiful man I love so much! I can actually spend days and days with him! I'm psyched!

Lame lame lame lamey lame-o. Fuck off, I'm in love.

Kayla's Unicorn needs open heart surgery. His battery has died. We've scheduled the OR for tomorrow morning. She's going to be my intern on this one. She's really excited about the chance to scrub in and assist. 

We've been watching a LOT of Grey's Anatomy together lately. 




Yesterday wasn't quite as bad as I thought it would be. They just did a biopsy to find out how far it's progressed. I have another appointment in two weeks to find out the results and discuss how we want to proceed. As if I had much of a choice, really. 

The really shitty part about yesterday was my psychotic mother calling me and fucking up my entire night.

She tried to take my car keys so I couldn't drive over to David's anymore. I wouldn't give them to her, so she has parked her car over behind mine to block me in so I can't go anywhere. If the swingset wasn't in my way I'd just do a fucking U-turn right through the front yard. Fuck that. And she threatened to call the police and report the car stollen if I try to drive anywhere, and press charges for grand theft or some shit. She wants me in jail. Why, I don't know. She did the same thing to my brother. Actually did have him sent to jail. What kind of a mother does that shit? I don't go out every single night and get totally wasted and drive home after she was supposed to be at work in the morning and then pass out and neglect my child all day every day. NO. I go out once a week to my boyfriend's house and sit on the couch and watch television all night. And I stay out late because, only being able to see him once a week, I would like to spend as much time with him as I can, when I can. And then I come home and get what sleep I can, and then take goddamned good care of my child all day, every day. 

I said to her, I can't believe you would actually do that to your child (try to get me put in jail). How fucking heartless. And she said to me, well I can't believe you would do the things that you do to your child. What? Like what??? Cook her three square meals a day and fix her snacks? Watch kids shows and movies with her? Play games with her? Read stories to her? Go for walks in the snow together? And give her her baths, make sure her nails are clipped and her ears are cleaned, and make sure she brushes her teeth every day, and get her jammies on her at night, and read to her, and tuck her in??? Those are her sure signs of neglect by a cold and unfeeling mother who would rather have a boyfriend than a child. Plus, I do the cleaning around here, the laundry, the dishes. AND I BAKE!!! I bake cookies, and cupcakes, and blueberry muffins in the morning. And Kayla helps me and I teach her things about counting and math and fractions and following directions while we read the recipes together. Yeah, FUCK YEAH, I'm a horrible fucking mother. God I hate being a mother. God I hate my child. RIGHT. 




Fuck. I hate my mother. 


I need to get the fuck out of this house.
A new episode of Grey's Anatomy tonight, and a fresh batch of chocolate cupcakes . . . I'm happy.

I think that I just lost a really incredible friend.










And I'm sick.

I am very glad that Derek and Merideth are finally once again exclusive in season three. Kind of an adorable throw-back to all the cuteness in the first season before that aweful wife of his was introduced. COME ON NEW EPISODES!!! I am really sick of the way they do television these days. Where they paly six episodes and then do re-runs for six weeks and then come back for three new episodes in January, re-run the entire season and then do the finale in like April or something. That pisses me off. There's supposed to be a full winter of all new episodes and then re-runs in the summer. Not re-reuns all year long. Fuck that.

Happy New Year.

On the Eve of this New Year, I fucked up my leg.

Enjoy.

Going home in the morn. Have a SEVEN HOUR layover in Chicago. Jesus. Sadly, no money left to go to Reckless while I'm there. And no David, so Chicago will be booooooring. I wish I could go home and just go straight to his house, and fall asleep in his arms, because I love him so, and I miss him, and I wish I could leave my family and just be with him forever. I hate having to be apart from him always. And nobody cares. So I'll stop talkingabout it now. Goodnight.
cd store was a little disappointing. Their prices and selection weren't as good as I remembered, and in NO WAY compare to Reckless Records. (sad face.)

It was 61 degrees here today. I wore short sleeves and sunglasses in December. I feel great. I've been doing much shopping and bought myself a lot of new clothes. And tomorrow my mom and sis-in-law are taking ALL of the kids to yet another mall, while my brother and I go cruising in his miata to a kickass resale record shop to fill our little hearts with joy buying incredible music at very low prices. And then we get to come home and listen to what we found turned up very loud because there will be no children here or uptight conservative prudes here to complain about the kind of music we listen to. I love that my brother has such great taste in music. Between him and David I am discovering new music I would have never been aware of otherwise, and I thank them both, the two loves of my life, for opening my eyes. I wish I could get the two of them together sometime. I know they would have so much in common, and they'd get along great. It would be really funny to just sit and listen to them have a conversation. They're both these awkward techy engineer types who listen to the same kind of music. Get them in a room together and extreme awkward cuteness would abound. I love those two. Especially David. And especially Dan. But especially David.

Lovey love love love love love. 


I'm so lame.

Everyone: I am really sorry that I sound so angry all the  time. I promise I'm not COMPLETELY psychotic. I just have really crazy angry moments sometimes, and I tend to use the internet as a place to vent, without realizing that what you know of me is what you read here, and what you read . . . is not really me. It's a part of me, true, but not all of me, and definitely not a part of me that I should be exposing everyone to via the internet. So: I'm back on my medication now that my throat is healed and I can swallow, I am SUPER EXCITED about the show this weekend, I am in a really good mood, and I'm going to try my damndist to stay that way. And if not, from now on at least, it's paper journals for the angy bullshit that nobody needs to hear, and I promise not to air my dirty psyche in public view. OK? Good. Now lets all be cool again.

listened to Max, Dave, and Chris rock out today. Super fantastic fun. . . . 

Hopefully make it to Chris' shindig tonight. 

Wack Trucks Saturday!!! Yay!!!





. . . and I think that's it.

Kayla got her Christmas pictures taken.























 



I'm sending out Christmas cards as soon as I get the pictures back, so if you want to be on my list (ho ho ho) just send me your address. 


Oh, man, I am so lame.

I wish I were a part of things still. I wish things were like they used to be. Or I at least wish I didn't care so much that they're not. Things are really shitty for me right now. Really really shitty. And I'm so afraid to do anything about it. Because if I try to change things, it will all turn shitty all over again. I didn't want this to happen. I didn't want this to happen. I didn't want this to happen. I wish things could be how I want them. And people would treat me the way I'd like to be treated. And that Kayla would be universally loved and accepted everywhere we go. My heart is breaking right now for my little girl. I've never seen a child face such rejection. Her father doesn't love her, doesn't care about her or want to see her. And neither does any man I've dated since. I'll never find somebody who will love and accept her. Therefore, I will never find anyone who will love and accept me. I will never find happiness in any relationship with any man. And I'm too goddamned hurt and scared right now to even try. I just wish I could be dumb, and accept the way things are as the way they're meant to be, and stop . . . hoping. I want things to change so badly, but I am cripled by the fear that if I do something drastic to bring any change, things will only get worse. Oh, god, I am so sad right now. I don't think I have ever been this terribly sad and heartbroken and rejected and alone feeling in all my life. What is wrong with me? Why can't I ever be happy? I can't stop crying. This is just about the lowest moment of my entire life. I am so scared and sad and lonely right now. I need help. And I don't think there's a single person in the whole world right now that I could turn to. I've never felt so alone in my life.

Watching Kingpin on tv and it's so fucking censored to shit it's not really even worth watching it anymore. 


My life is so boring. 

The muffler is about to fall off my car. It's seriously dragging on the ground. I bottomed out on David's driveway the other day and totally fucked it up. So now it's snowy, and my car's too fucked up to drive anywhere, and all I have to do is sit around here and get drunk and take pain killers and yell at people and pass out. 


Well . . . , better get started.

Happy Thanksgiving, 
Turkey-Face!!!!!




Gobble Gobble Gobble!!!!
